â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Common Sense is the fifth major expansion for Europa Universalis IV and â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ focuses on diplomacy and the internal development of nations. This      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ addition allows you to peacefully develop your nation and build a       â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ 'tall' empire, whilst also giving you the tools to execute grand        â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ diplomacy. Game changing religious features add depth and intriguing    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ complexity to the gameplay.                                             â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ The ability to work closely with your subjects and better control them  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ through interactions and decrees should make common sense for anyone    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ with designs to get to terms with the internal struggles of             â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ constitutional monarchies.                                              â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
